item.title: My Hugo & Congo Configuration
item.description: This document summarises how I set-up this website’s layout, fonts and typesetting. As a result, I highly recommend the Congo theme for the Hugo static site generator due to its layout, styling and extensibility. Additions to Congo # I added some features because I’m not pleased with how Hugo’s Shortcode syntax prevents some content from being rendered correctly on external Markdown platforms such as GitHub and GitLab. KaTeX # The following layouts/partials/extend-head.
